content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":262312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　上級も上級、第２級魔神です。","translatedEnglishLine":"An advanced one, an advanced one indeed, a second-rank demon god."},{"lineNumber":262313,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・・２流悪魔みたいで弱そうだが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...It looks weak like a second-rate demon, though..."},{"lineNumber":262314,"originalJapaneseLine":"　違います、私が１番階級が高かった時で６級が限界だったし","translatedEnglishLine":"No, when I had the highest rank, sixth rank was the limit."},{"lineNumber":262315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それよりはるか上です、人間とかが手出し出来る範疇じゃないです","translatedEnglishLine":"It's far above that; it's beyond the range where humans can intervene."},{"lineNumber":262316,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに・・口ごもる　（　フェリスに酷い罰を与えた存在がネプラカス","translatedEnglishLine":"And... he hesitates to speak (Nepurakasu is the one who inflicted a harsh punishment on Felis)."},{"lineNumber":262317,"originalJapaneseLine":"震えているフェリスの手を握り","translatedEnglishLine":"He holds the trembling hand of Felis."},{"lineNumber":262318,"originalJapaneseLine":"天使が来ても悪魔が来ても守ってやる、俺のおもちゃだからなお前は","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether angels or demons come, I'll protect you, because you are my toy after all."},{"lineNumber":262319,"originalJapaneseLine":"とランスが言っても微妙に聞こえてない、まだ震えてるフェリス、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though Rance says that, Felis only partially hears it and is still trembling."},{"lineNumber":262320,"originalJapaneseLine":"う、うう、どうせ言ったところで聞くような人じゃないし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"U-uh, anyway, he's not someone who would listen even if I said something..."},{"lineNumber":262321,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも・・本当にネプラカスには近づかないで、お願いしますと真剣にお願い","translatedEnglishLine":"But... please, really don't get close to Nepurakasu, I earnestly ask you."},{"lineNumber":262322,"originalJapaneseLine":"あ、ああ・・さすがにちょっと押される","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, yeah... I'm being pushed back a bit, as expected."},{"lineNumber":262323,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスと出会う、彼も冒険でここに来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Meeting Dark Rance, he also came here on an adventure."},{"lineNumber":262324,"originalJapaneseLine":"（自由都市１、２でも会っているので、それに合わせて）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Since they've met in Free City 1 and 2, this aligns with that.)"},{"lineNumber":262325,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":262326,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスがランスの元に居るのをここで始めてみます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Here is the first time we see Felis staying by Rance's side."},{"lineNumber":262327,"originalJapaneseLine":"かあちゃーん！　フェリスは名前呼べないのでびっくりしつつ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mommy! Felis can’t call the name properly, surprised as she does so,"},{"lineNumber":262328,"originalJapaneseLine":"お互いにひしっと抱き合う、涙ぐみながらフェリスも嬉しそう、感動の再会","translatedEnglishLine":"They tightly embrace each other; Felis, tearful, also looks happy—a moving reunion."},{"lineNumber":262329,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんなに大きくなって、無事だったのね良かった・・と母ちゃんぽいノリ","translatedEnglishLine":"You've grown so much, and you’ve been safe, thank goodness... in a motherly tone."},{"lineNumber":262330,"originalJapaneseLine":"べりーっとランスが二人を引きはがす","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance tears them apart forcefully."},{"lineNumber":262331,"originalJapaneseLine":"てめー何すんだ！　くっ、やっぱりその男の元にいたのか・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"You bastard, what the hell are you doing!? Damn, so you really were with that man..."},{"lineNumber":262332,"originalJapaneseLine":"がーはーはーはー、残念だったなコイツは俺のもんだー、触るな触るな","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha, too bad! This one is mine, don’t touch, don’t touch."},{"lineNumber":262333,"originalJapaneseLine":"こ、この野郎・・と剣を握るが、フェリスは私なら大丈夫、お願い無茶しないで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-you bastard... gripping the sword, but Felis says, 'I'm fine, please don’t do anything reckless.'"},{"lineNumber":262334,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・それより貴方が無事で本当に良かったと健気","translatedEnglishLine":"...More than that, it's truly a relief that you are safe, she says earnestly."},{"lineNumber":262335,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・これまではすぐに救い出すつもりだったが、そういうことなら・・と決意を語る","translatedEnglishLine":"...Until now, I intended to rescue you immediately, but if that’s the case... he speaks his determination."},{"lineNumber":262336,"originalJapaneseLine":"オイラがいつかその男から助け出す","translatedEnglishLine":"I will someday rescue you from that man."},{"lineNumber":262337,"originalJapaneseLine":"その男の事はマリアから聞いた、いろいろ聞いた","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard about that man from Maria, I heard many things."},{"lineNumber":262338,"originalJapaneseLine":"すごい奴だと分かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I understood he’s an amazing guy."},{"lineNumber":262339,"originalJapaneseLine":"超える事を目標にする、その男が出来た事は俺も全てする","translatedEnglishLine":"My goal is to surpass him; I will do everything that man did."},{"lineNumber":262340,"originalJapaneseLine":"それが出来た後、挑戦し母を救い出す","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, I will challenge him and rescue my mother."},{"lineNumber":262341,"originalJapaneseLine":"待っていてくれ母ちゃん！　う、うん","translatedEnglishLine":"Please wait for me, mother! Uh, yup."},{"lineNumber":262342,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのマフラー、とフェリスがダークランスが持つマフラーに気がつく","translatedEnglishLine":"That scarf—Felis notices the scarf Dark Rance is holding."},{"lineNumber":262343,"originalJapaneseLine":"でもダークランスには言わずに心の中で、よかった、あの子の元に渡ったんだと","translatedEnglishLine":"But without telling Dark Rance, she thinks to herself, 'Good, it ended up with that child.'"},{"lineNumber":262344,"originalJapaneseLine":"立ち去り際、独り言　そうか・・ランス、母を連れて今日ここにいるという事は","translatedEnglishLine":"As he leaves, he mutters to himself: So... Rance is here today with his mother, which means..."},{"lineNumber":262345,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスと戦う気なのか・・くっ、まだオイラには奴を近くで確認するぐらいしか出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"He intends to fight Nepurakasu... Damn. I can only manage to observe him closely for now."},{"lineNumber":262346,"originalJapaneseLine":"でかいな・・だが、いつか追い抜く","translatedEnglishLine":"It's huge... but someday, I'll surpass him."},{"lineNumber":262347,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":262348,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランス立ち去ってから","translatedEnglishLine":"After Dark Rance leaves."},{"lineNumber":262349,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがマリアに言う","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says to Maria."},{"lineNumber":262350,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほう、俺様の事をいろいろ言っていたようだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh? It seems she was saying various things about me."},{"lineNumber":262351,"originalJapaneseLine":"えらいあいつ、俺の事を認めるようになっていたな","translatedEnglishLine":"That remarkable one has come to acknowledge me."},{"lineNumber":262352,"originalJapaneseLine":"別にランスを褒めまくったわけじゃないわよ、事実を教えてあげただけ","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m not exactly praising Rance, I just told her the facts."},{"lineNumber":262353,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ、そりゃそうだな、俺の過去の実績を知ればおどろくしかあるまい","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, that’s true; she would be shocked to know about my past achievements."},{"lineNumber":262354,"originalJapaneseLine":"超えられない偉大な父に恐れをなしたという所か、がははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps she was scared by the great father she couldn’t surpass. Gahahaha."},{"lineNumber":262355,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、それはそれとして・・いつまで泣いてんだ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway... how long are you going to keep crying?"},{"lineNumber":262356,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリス、えーんえーん、べそべそ泣きじゃくる。無事で良かったよー、","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis sobs loudly, crying bitterly. I'm so glad you’re safe."},{"lineNumber":262357,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか不思議な気配・・フェリスが言う、上級悪魔ネプラカス。","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s a strange presence... Felis says: the high-ranking demon Nepurakasu."},{"lineNumber":262358,"originalJapaneseLine":"近づいてきます。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s approaching."},{"lineNumber":262359,"originalJapaneseLine":"いいですか、絶対に声を出してはいけない、息も出来るだけ控えて","translatedEnglishLine":"Listen carefully, don’t make a sound, and suppress your breath as much as possible."},{"lineNumber":262360,"originalJapaneseLine":"通り過ぎるのを待つのです。","translatedEnglishLine":"We wait for it to pass by."},{"lineNumber":262361,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルとか一部の者はわくわく、上級悪魔か・・どんなのだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Some, like Miracle, are excited—'A high-ranking demon... I wonder what it’ll be like?'"},{"lineNumber":262362,"originalJapaneseLine":"異形の巨大物体、上級悪魔ネプラカスが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"An uncanny giant figure, the high-ranking demon Nepurakasu appears."},{"lineNumber":262363,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか怖い　（ＢＧＭは切った方がいいかな）","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow scary (maybe I should turn off the BGM)."},{"lineNumber":262364,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人では無いがとんでもなく強いぞ、大怪獣以上だろうとカオス","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s not a demon god, but unbelievably strong, probably stronger than a giant monster, says Chaos."},{"lineNumber":262365,"originalJapaneseLine":"通り過ぎていく・・ゆっくりなので５分・・１０分・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It passes by... slowly, 5 minutes... 10 minutes..."},{"lineNumber":262366,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":262367,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　じっと通り過ぎるのを待つ","translatedEnglishLine":"> Wait quietly for it to pass."},{"lineNumber":262368,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　笑いを取る","translatedEnglishLine":"> Make a joke."},{"lineNumber":262369,"originalJapaneseLine":"緊張に耐えれなく、ランスがぼそっと馬鹿な事を言う","translatedEnglishLine":"Unable to endure the tension, Rance mutters something stupid."},{"lineNumber":262370,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが笑ってしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone laughs."},{"lineNumber":262371,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスが止まる、こちらを見る、人間がいる・・お前はとフェリスを見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"Nepurakasu stops and looks here, sees a human... finds Felis and says, 'You.'" }]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上級も上級、第２級魔神です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An advanced one, an advanced one indeed, a second-rank demon god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・２流悪魔みたいで弱そうだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...It looks weak like a second-rate demon, though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違います、私が１番階級が高かった時で６級が限界だったし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, when I had the highest rank, sixth rank was the limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それよりはるか上です、人間とかが手出し出来る範疇じゃないです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's far above that; it's beyond the range where humans can intervene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに・・口ごもる　（　フェリスに酷い罰を与えた存在がネプラカス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And... he hesitates to speak (Nepurakasu is the one who inflicted a harsh punishment on Felis).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 震えているフェリスの手を握り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He holds the trembling hand of Felis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天使が来ても悪魔が来ても守ってやる、俺のおもちゃだからなお前は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether angels or demons come, I'll protect you, because you are my toy after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランスが言っても微妙に聞こえてない、まだ震えてるフェリス、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though Rance says that, Felis only partially hears it and is still trembling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う、うう、どうせ言ったところで聞くような人じゃないし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-uh, anyway, he's not someone who would listen even if I said something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも・・本当にネプラカスには近づかないで、お願いしますと真剣にお願い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... please, really don't get close to Nepurakasu, I earnestly ask you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、ああ・・さすがにちょっと押される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, yeah... I'm being pushed back a bit, as expected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスと出会う、彼も冒険でここに来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting Dark Rance, he also came here on an adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （自由都市１、２でも会っているので、それに合わせて）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Since they've met in Free City 1 and 2, this aligns with that.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスがランスの元に居るのをここで始めてみます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here is the first time we see Felis staying by Rance's side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かあちゃーん！　フェリスは名前呼べないのでびっくりしつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mommy! Felis can’t call the name properly, surprised as she does so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いにひしっと抱き合う、涙ぐみながらフェリスも嬉しそう、感動の再会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They tightly embrace each other; Felis, tearful, also looks happy—a moving reunion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなに大きくなって、無事だったのね良かった・・と母ちゃんぽいノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've grown so much, and you’ve been safe, thank goodness... in a motherly tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: べりーっとランスが二人を引きはがす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tears them apart forcefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てめー何すんだ！　くっ、やっぱりその男の元にいたのか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bastard, what the hell are you doing!? Damn, so you really were with that man...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がーはーはーはー、残念だったなコイツは俺のもんだー、触るな触るな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, too bad! This one is mine, don’t touch, don’t touch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こ、この野郎・・と剣を握るが、フェリスは私なら大丈夫、お願い無茶しないで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-you bastard... gripping the sword, but Felis says, 'I'm fine, please don’t do anything reckless.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・それより貴方が無事で本当に良かったと健気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...More than that, it's truly a relief that you are safe, she says earnestly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・これまではすぐに救い出すつもりだったが、そういうことなら・・と決意を語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Until now, I intended to rescue you immediately, but if that’s the case... he speaks his determination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オイラがいつかその男から助け出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will someday rescue you from that man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その男の事はマリアから聞いた、いろいろ聞いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard about that man from Maria, I heard many things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい奴だと分かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understood he’s an amazing guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超える事を目標にする、その男が出来た事は俺も全てする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My goal is to surpass him; I will do everything that man did.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが出来た後、挑戦し母を救い出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, I will challenge him and rescue my mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待っていてくれ母ちゃん！　う、うん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please wait for me, mother! Uh, yup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのマフラー、とフェリスがダークランスが持つマフラーに気がつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That scarf—Felis notices the scarf Dark Rance is holding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもダークランスには言わずに心の中で、よかった、あの子の元に渡ったんだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But without telling Dark Rance, she thinks to herself, 'Good, it ended up with that child.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち去り際、独り言　そうか・・ランス、母を連れて今日ここにいるという事は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he leaves, he mutters to himself: So... Rance is here today with his mother, which means...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスと戦う気なのか・・くっ、まだオイラには奴を近くで確認するぐらいしか出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He intends to fight Nepurakasu... Damn. I can only manage to observe him closely for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でかいな・・だが、いつか追い抜く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's huge... but someday, I'll surpass him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランス立ち去ってから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Dark Rance leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがマリアに言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says to Maria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう、俺様の事をいろいろ言っていたようだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? It seems she was saying various things about me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えらいあいつ、俺の事を認めるようになっていたな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That remarkable one has come to acknowledge me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にランスを褒めまくったわけじゃないわよ、事実を教えてあげただけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not exactly praising Rance, I just told her the facts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、そりゃそうだな、俺の過去の実績を知ればおどろくしかあるまい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, that’s true; she would be shocked to know about my past achievements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超えられない偉大な父に恐れをなしたという所か、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps she was scared by the great father she couldn’t surpass. Gahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、それはそれとして・・いつまで泣いてんだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway... how long are you going to keep crying?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリス、えーんえーん、べそべそ泣きじゃくる。無事で良かったよー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis sobs loudly, crying bitterly. I'm so glad you’re safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか不思議な気配・・フェリスが言う、上級悪魔ネプラカス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s a strange presence... Felis says: the high-ranking demon Nepurakasu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近づいてきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいですか、絶対に声を出してはいけない、息も出来るだけ控えて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen carefully, don’t make a sound, and suppress your breath as much as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通り過ぎるのを待つのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We wait for it to pass by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルとか一部の者はわくわく、上級悪魔か・・どんなのだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some, like Miracle, are excited—'A high-ranking demon... I wonder what it’ll be like?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異形の巨大物体、上級悪魔ネプラカスが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An uncanny giant figure, the high-ranking demon Nepurakasu appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか怖い　（ＢＧＭは切った方がいいかな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow scary (maybe I should turn off the BGM).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人では無いがとんでもなく強いぞ、大怪獣以上だろうとカオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not a demon god, but unbelievably strong, probably stronger than a giant monster, says Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通り過ぎていく・・ゆっくりなので５分・・１０分・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It passes by... slowly, 5 minutes... 10 minutes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　じっと通り過ぎるのを待つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Wait quietly for it to pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　笑いを取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Make a joke.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊張に耐えれなく、ランスがぼそっと馬鹿な事を言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to endure the tension, Rance mutters something stupid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが笑ってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone laughs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスが止まる、こちらを見る、人間がいる・・お前はとフェリスを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nepurakasu stops and looks here, sees a human... finds Felis and says, 'You.'

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":262312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　上級も上級、第２級魔神です。","translatedEnglishLine":"An advanced one, an advanced one indeed, a second-rank demon god."},{"lineNumber":262313,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・・２流悪魔みたいで弱そうだが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...It looks weak like a second-rate demon, though..."},{"lineNumber":262314,"originalJapaneseLine":"　違います、私が１番階級が高かった時で６級が限界だったし","translatedEnglishLine":"No, when I had the highest rank, sixth rank was the limit."},{"lineNumber":262315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それよりはるか上です、人間とかが手出し出来る範疇じゃないです","translatedEnglishLine":"It's far above that; it's beyond the range where humans can intervene."},{"lineNumber":262316,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに・・口ごもる　（　フェリスに酷い罰を与えた存在がネプラカス","translatedEnglishLine":"And... he hesitates to speak (Nepurakasu is the one who inflicted a harsh punishment on Felis)."},{"lineNumber":262317,"originalJapaneseLine":"震えているフェリスの手を握り","translatedEnglishLine":"He holds the trembling hand of Felis."},{"lineNumber":262318,"originalJapaneseLine":"天使が来ても悪魔が来ても守ってやる、俺のおもちゃだからなお前は","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether angels or demons come, I'll protect you, because you are my toy after all."},{"lineNumber":262319,"originalJapaneseLine":"とランスが言っても微妙に聞こえてない、まだ震えてるフェリス、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though Rance says that, Felis only partially hears it and is still trembling."},{"lineNumber":262320,"originalJapaneseLine":"う、うう、どうせ言ったところで聞くような人じゃないし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"U-uh, anyway, he's not someone who would listen even if I said something..."},{"lineNumber":262321,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも・・本当にネプラカスには近づかないで、お願いしますと真剣にお願い","translatedEnglishLine":"But... please, really don't get close to Nepurakasu, I earnestly ask you."},{"lineNumber":262322,"originalJapaneseLine":"あ、ああ・・さすがにちょっと押される","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, yeah... I'm being pushed back a bit, as expected."},{"lineNumber":262323,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスと出会う、彼も冒険でここに来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Meeting Dark Rance, he also came here on an adventure."},{"lineNumber":262324,"originalJapaneseLine":"（自由都市１、２でも会っているので、それに合わせて）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Since they've met in Free City 1 and 2, this aligns with that.)"},{"lineNumber":262325,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":262326,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスがランスの元に居るのをここで始めてみます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Here is the first time we see Felis staying by Rance's side."},{"lineNumber":262327,"originalJapaneseLine":"かあちゃーん！　フェリスは名前呼べないのでびっくりしつつ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mommy! Felis can’t call the name properly, surprised as she does so,"},{"lineNumber":262328,"originalJapaneseLine":"お互いにひしっと抱き合う、涙ぐみながらフェリスも嬉しそう、感動の再会","translatedEnglishLine":"They tightly embrace each other; Felis, tearful, also looks happy—a moving reunion."},{"lineNumber":262329,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんなに大きくなって、無事だったのね良かった・・と母ちゃんぽいノリ","translatedEnglishLine":"You've grown so much, and you’ve been safe, thank goodness... in a motherly tone."},{"lineNumber":262330,"originalJapaneseLine":"べりーっとランスが二人を引きはがす","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance tears them apart forcefully."},{"lineNumber":262331,"originalJapaneseLine":"てめー何すんだ！　くっ、やっぱりその男の元にいたのか・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"You bastard, what the hell are you doing!? This one is mine, don’t touch, don’t touch."},{"lineNumber":262333,"originalJapaneseLine":"こ、この野郎・・と剣を握るが、フェリスは私なら大丈夫、お願い無茶しないで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-you bastard... gripping the sword, but Felis says, 'I'm fine, please don’t do anything reckless.'"},{"lineNumber":262334,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・それより貴方が無事で本当に良かったと健気","translatedEnglishLine":"...More than that, it's truly a relief that you are safe, she says earnestly."},{"lineNumber":262335,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・これまではすぐに救い出すつもりだったが、そういうことなら・・と決意を語る","translatedEnglishLine":"...Until now, I intended to rescue you immediately, but if that’s the case... he speaks his determination."},{"lineNumber":262336,"originalJapaneseLine":"オイラがいつかその男から助け出す","translatedEnglishLine":"I will someday rescue you from that man."},{"lineNumber":262337,"originalJapaneseLine":"その男の事はマリアから聞いた、いろいろ聞いた","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard about that man from Maria, I heard many things."},{"lineNumber":262338,"originalJapaneseLine":"すごい奴だと分かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I understood he’s an amazing guy."},{"lineNumber":262339,"originalJapaneseLine":"超える事を目標にする、その男が出来た事は俺も全てする","translatedEnglishLine":"My goal is to surpass him; I will do everything that man did."},{"lineNumber":262340,"originalJapaneseLine":"それが出来た後、挑戦し母を救い出す","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, I will challenge him and rescue my mother."},{"lineNumber":262341,"originalJapaneseLine":"待っていてくれ母ちゃん！　う、うん","translatedEnglishLine":"Please wait for me, mother! Uh, yup."},{"lineNumber":262342,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのマフラー、とフェリスがダークランスが持つマフラーに気がつく","translatedEnglishLine":"That scarf—Felis notices the scarf Dark Rance is holding."},{"lineNumber":262343,"originalJapaneseLine":"でもダークランスには言わずに心の中で、よかった、あの子の元に渡ったんだと","translatedEnglishLine":"But without telling Dark Rance, she thinks to herself, 'Good, it ended up with that child.'"},{"lineNumber":262344,"originalJapaneseLine":"立ち去り際、独り言　そうか・・ランス、母を連れて今日ここにいるという事は","translatedEnglishLine":"As he leaves, he mutters to himself: So... Rance is here today with his mother, which means..."},{"lineNumber":262345,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスと戦う気なのか・・くっ、まだオイラには奴を近くで確認するぐらいしか出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"He intends to fight Nepurakasu... Damn. I can only manage to observe him closely for now."},{"lineNumber":262346,"originalJapaneseLine":"でかいな・・だが、いつか追い抜く","translatedEnglishLine":"It's huge... but someday, I'll surpass him."},{"lineNumber":262347,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":262348,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランス立ち去ってから","translatedEnglishLine":"After Dark Rance leaves."},{"lineNumber":262349,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがマリアに言う","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says to Maria."},{"lineNumber":262350,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほう、俺様の事をいろいろ言っていたようだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh? It seems she was saying various things about me."},{"lineNumber":262351,"originalJapaneseLine":"えらいあいつ、俺の事を認めるようになっていたな","translatedEnglishLine":"That remarkable one has come to acknowledge me."},{"lineNumber":262352,"originalJapaneseLine":"別にランスを褒めまくったわけじゃないわよ、事実を教えてあげただけ","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m not exactly praising Rance, I just told her the facts."},{"lineNumber":262353,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ、そりゃそうだな、俺の過去の実績を知ればおどろくしかあるまい","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, that’s true; she would be shocked to know about my past achievements."},{"lineNumber":262354,"originalJapaneseLine":"超えられない偉大な父に恐れをなしたという所か、がははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps she was scared by the great father she couldn’t surpass. Gahahaha."},{"lineNumber":262355,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、それはそれとして・・いつまで泣いてんだ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway... how long are you going to keep crying?"},{"lineNumber":262356,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリス、えーんえーん、べそべそ泣きじゃくる。無事で良かったよー、","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis sobs loudly, crying bitterly. I'm so glad you’re safe."},{"lineNumber":262357,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか不思議な気配・・フェリスが言う、上級悪魔ネプラカス。","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s a strange presence... I wonder what it’ll be like?'"},{"lineNumber":262362,"originalJapaneseLine":"異形の巨大物体、上級悪魔ネプラカスが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"An uncanny giant figure, the high-ranking demon Nepurakasu appears."},{"lineNumber":262363,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか怖い　（ＢＧＭは切った方がいいかな）","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow scary (maybe I should turn off the BGM)."},{"lineNumber":262364,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人では無いがとんでもなく強いぞ、大怪獣以上だろうとカオス","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s not a demon god, but unbelievably strong, probably stronger than a giant monster, says Chaos."},{"lineNumber":262365,"originalJapaneseLine":"通り過ぎていく・・ゆっくりなので５分・・１０分・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It passes by... slowly, 5 minutes... 10 minutes..."},{"lineNumber":262366,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":262367,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　じっと通り過ぎるのを待つ","translatedEnglishLine":"> Wait quietly for it to pass."},{"lineNumber":262368,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　笑いを取る","translatedEnglishLine":"> Make a joke."},{"lineNumber":262369,"originalJapaneseLine":"緊張に耐えれなく、ランスがぼそっと馬鹿な事を言う","translatedEnglishLine":"Unable to endure the tension, Rance mutters something stupid."},{"lineNumber":262370,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが笑ってしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone laughs."},{"lineNumber":262371,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスが止まる、こちらを見る、人間がいる・・お前はとフェリスを見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"Nepurakasu stops and looks here, sees a human... finds Felis and says, 'You.'" }]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上級も上級、第２級魔神です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An advanced one, an advanced one indeed, a second-rank demon god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・２流悪魔みたいで弱そうだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...It looks weak like a second-rate demon, though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違います、私が１番階級が高かった時で６級が限界だったし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, when I had the highest rank, sixth rank was the limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それよりはるか上です、人間とかが手出し出来る範疇じゃないです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's far above that; it's beyond the range where humans can intervene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに・・口ごもる　（　フェリスに酷い罰を与えた存在がネプラカス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And... he hesitates to speak (Nepurakasu is the one who inflicted a harsh punishment on Felis).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 震えているフェリスの手を握り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He holds the trembling hand of Felis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天使が来ても悪魔が来ても守ってやる、俺のおもちゃだからなお前は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether angels or demons come, I'll protect you, because you are my toy after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランスが言っても微妙に聞こえてない、まだ震えてるフェリス、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though Rance says that, Felis only partially hears it and is still trembling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う、うう、どうせ言ったところで聞くような人じゃないし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-uh, anyway, he's not someone who would listen even if I said something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも・・本当にネプラカスには近づかないで、お願いしますと真剣にお願い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... please, really don't get close to Nepurakasu, I earnestly ask you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、ああ・・さすがにちょっと押される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, yeah... I'm being pushed back a bit, as expected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスと出会う、彼も冒険でここに来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting Dark Rance, he also came here on an adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （自由都市１、２でも会っているので、それに合わせて）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Since they've met in Free City 1 and 2, this aligns with that.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスがランスの元に居るのをここで始めてみます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here is the first time we see Felis staying by Rance's side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かあちゃーん！　フェリスは名前呼べないのでびっくりしつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mommy! Felis can’t call the name properly, surprised as she does so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いにひしっと抱き合う、涙ぐみながらフェリスも嬉しそう、感動の再会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They tightly embrace each other; Felis, tearful, also looks happy—a moving reunion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなに大きくなって、無事だったのね良かった・・と母ちゃんぽいノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've grown so much, and you’ve been safe, thank goodness... in a motherly tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: べりーっとランスが二人を引きはがす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tears them apart forcefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てめー何すんだ！　くっ、やっぱりその男の元にいたのか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bastard, what the hell are you doing!? Damn, so you really were with that man...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がーはーはーはー、残念だったなコイツは俺のもんだー、触るな触るな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, too bad! This one is mine, don’t touch, don’t touch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こ、この野郎・・と剣を握るが、フェリスは私なら大丈夫、お願い無茶しないで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-you bastard... gripping the sword, but Felis says, 'I'm fine, please don’t do anything reckless.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・それより貴方が無事で本当に良かったと健気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...More than that, it's truly a relief that you are safe, she says earnestly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・これまではすぐに救い出すつもりだったが、そういうことなら・・と決意を語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Until now, I intended to rescue you immediately, but if that’s the case... he speaks his determination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オイラがいつかその男から助け出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will someday rescue you from that man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その男の事はマリアから聞いた、いろいろ聞いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard about that man from Maria, I heard many things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい奴だと分かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understood he’s an amazing guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超える事を目標にする、その男が出来た事は俺も全てする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My goal is to surpass him; I will do everything that man did.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが出来た後、挑戦し母を救い出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, I will challenge him and rescue my mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待っていてくれ母ちゃん！　う、うん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please wait for me, mother! Uh, yup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのマフラー、とフェリスがダークランスが持つマフラーに気がつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That scarf—Felis notices the scarf Dark Rance is holding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもダークランスには言わずに心の中で、よかった、あの子の元に渡ったんだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But without telling Dark Rance, she thinks to herself, 'Good, it ended up with that child.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち去り際、独り言　そうか・・ランス、母を連れて今日ここにいるという事は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he leaves, he mutters to himself: So... Rance is here today with his mother, which means...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスと戦う気なのか・・くっ、まだオイラには奴を近くで確認するぐらいしか出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He intends to fight Nepurakasu... Damn. I can only manage to observe him closely for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でかいな・・だが、いつか追い抜く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's huge... but someday, I'll surpass him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランス立ち去ってから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Dark Rance leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがマリアに言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says to Maria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう、俺様の事をいろいろ言っていたようだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? It seems she was saying various things about me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えらいあいつ、俺の事を認めるようになっていたな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That remarkable one has come to acknowledge me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にランスを褒めまくったわけじゃないわよ、事実を教えてあげただけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not exactly praising Rance, I just told her the facts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、そりゃそうだな、俺の過去の実績を知ればおどろくしかあるまい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, that’s true; she would be shocked to know about my past achievements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超えられない偉大な父に恐れをなしたという所か、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps she was scared by the great father she couldn’t surpass. Gahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、それはそれとして・・いつまで泣いてんだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway... how long are you going to keep crying?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリス、えーんえーん、べそべそ泣きじゃくる。無事で良かったよー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis sobs loudly, crying bitterly. I'm so glad you’re safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか不思議な気配・・フェリスが言う、上級悪魔ネプラカス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s a strange presence... Felis says: the high-ranking demon Nepurakasu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近づいてきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいですか、絶対に声を出してはいけない、息も出来るだけ控えて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen carefully, don’t make a sound, and suppress your breath as much as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通り過ぎるのを待つのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We wait for it to pass by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルとか一部の者はわくわく、上級悪魔か・・どんなのだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some, like Miracle, are excited—'A high-ranking demon... I wonder what it’ll be like?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異形の巨大物体、上級悪魔ネプラカスが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An uncanny giant figure, the high-ranking demon Nepurakasu appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか怖い　（ＢＧＭは切った方がいいかな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow scary (maybe I should turn off the BGM).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人では無いがとんでもなく強いぞ、大怪獣以上だろうとカオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not a demon god, but unbelievably strong, probably stronger than a giant monster, says Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通り過ぎていく・・ゆっくりなので５分・・１０分・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It passes by... slowly, 5 minutes... 10 minutes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　じっと通り過ぎるのを待つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Wait quietly for it to pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　笑いを取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Make a joke.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊張に耐えれなく、ランスがぼそっと馬鹿な事を言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to endure the tension, Rance mutters something stupid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが笑ってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone laughs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスが止まる、こちらを見る、人間がいる・・お前はとフェリスを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nepurakasu stops and looks here, sees a human... finds Felis and says, 'You.'
